subject: My order
description_text: Good afternoon I purchased a set of your SIMSONN PRO X Ultra Sim Racing Pedals PC Racing Simulator Pedals Pressure Sensor Load Cell HE Hydraulic Pedals Support Haptic Reactor (PRO X U-P3-H3-1-1) Off of Amazon I have received my pedals but I didn’t receive heel plate or base plate with my pedals on the item description it show base plate & heel plate in the attachment below u will see my order number I look forward to hearing back from you thank you in advance

conversations.body_text: Hi Leviticusjohnson530,     Hi, I am sorry for it. We have reshipped a new package to you from our US warehouse, here is the tracking number: 1ZJ201H40301780934 , the shipping carrier is UPS, you can track it via https://www.ups.com/track.
